title: Herman: The Fourth Treasury
description: "The low, mean wit of Jim Unger makes Herman uncommonly hilarious."-- Chicago TribuneCelebrate Herman 's success with The Fourth Treasury . Herman is Everyman--he's a doctor, a waiter, a loan applicant, a duck, a Hun, even a she! He's that invariably hapless goof who wears a bow tie on his head and removable feet on his legs.Join the millions who already read Herman and become a new fan with The Fourth Treasury .
author: Jim Unger
